Meteara: I approve your decision. I will watch. Meteara out.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Gracius:  Very well we have a supply of energon to last us several 
> stellar cycles.  We shall not require any from this world.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Meteara thinks. Maybe they could help her in some way.
> > 
> > Meteara: Then I ask that you do not look for the crystal you name 
> > energon. This Vector needs it desperately, and there is already 
one 
> > life sphere that has been destroyed. Your intentions seem to be 
> good, 
> > but do not disturb the lifeflow or the time continuum here. I may 
> > require your cooperation later, so I wish you will understand the 
> > requests I make.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > Gracius: We are the Cybertronian Order of Monks.  We
> > > seek only peace.  We will obey whatever regulations
> > > your masters require of us, but this is the planet to
> > > which the Matrix has guided us.  We promise not to
> > > disturb history in a negative way.
> > > 
> > > Gracius waits for Cheetah to begin the transformation
> > > of the ship to a base for the landing.
> > > 
> > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC:I know you'll land anyways, I'm just playing her
> > > > 
> > > > Standing on the moon, Meteara's sensors detect the
> > > > incoming ship. She 
> > > > calls them out on their own frequency.
> > > > 
> > > > Meteara: Cybertronian Ship, I am Meteara, second
> > > > emissary of the Vok. 
> > > > I must warn you that there are many other
> > > > Cybertronians on Vector 
> > > > Earth, and that your presence will unbalance its
> > > > stability. Therefore, 
> > > > I ask you not to land.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > ooc:sorry if I moved Peg to neutral but I really
> > > > wanted to play him 
> > > > =P
> > > > > so I'll make another char soon.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816"
> > > > <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > OOC: I'm sick of waiting for this post.  2
> > > > Pascifist bios are up 
> > > > and 
> > > > > > that's enough proof that the council approves
> > > > for me.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > BIC:  Gracius stares out of a window as they
> > > > come out of Transwarp 
> > > > > > space.  He reconizes the place as Earth.  He
> > > > controls his surprise 
> > > > > > and appears as if he were expecting this.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Gracius:  It appears the Matrix has plans for us
> > > > that may involve 
> > > > > > reordering history.  Perhaps we can end the
> > > > Great War by teaching 
> > > > > the 
> > > > > > Autobots and Decepticons of peace.  Cheetah
> > > > prepare the Peacecraft 
> > > > > > (I'm a Gundam fan and I made up the name at the
> > > > last minute) for 
> > > > > > transformation.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > The ship begins descent towards a Northern land
> > > > area resembling 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > Himalaya Mountains.
> > > >
